title: Hour 2: Playmaker's playmakers
description:
Stephen A., Ryan Clark and the playmaker Michael Irvin discuss who had the biggest collapse in the NFL, the most disappointing team thus far as well as what the Patriots win means for the outlook of their season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
